attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Corus Teesside will close at the end of January, with a loss of well over 4,000 jobs.  The government has used public money to bail out the banks, now we are asking for help in the North East for our steel industry.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to help CORUS Teesside.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=CORUS-HELP


Her Majesty's Government
